snippet: Bulwark FR sells clothing worn by industrial workers and usually makes its pitches in traditional business-to-business ways. This time, it is using a video incorporating the work of a paper sculptor.
abstract: Bulwark FR sells clothing worn by industrial workers and usually makes its pitches in traditional business-to-business ways. This time, it is using a video incorporating the work of a paper sculptor.

headline.main: Ad for Fire-Resistant Clothes Uses an Unusually Artsy Approach
